content: this pattern is available for free at https //www windingroadcrochet com/how-to-crochet-twisted-ear-warmer-pattern/ or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern the pattern is written in english using us terms and has been written for 3 different yarns sizes and has size baby through adult sizes pattern level easy this pattern uses the chain single_crochet single_crochet increase and working into the sides of row materials needed size 4-6 yarn 5 6 5 or 10 mm crochet hook yarn needle and scissors polyfil this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2019 winding road crochet purchaser is not allowed to copy sell or reproduce this pattern in any way because this is a digital product there will be no refunds after purchase
